#=============================================================================
#
# file :        CMakeLists.txt
#
# description : File to generate a TANGO device server using cmake.
#
# project :     MKS_MicrovisionIP_RGA
#
#=============================================================================
#                This file is generated by POGO
#        (Program Obviously used to Generate tango Object)
#=============================================================================
#
#
cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 2.8)
set(CMAKE_SKIP_RPATH TRUE)

# MAKE_ENV is the path to find common environment to build project
#
set(MAKE_ENV /segfs/tango/cppserver/env)
#
# Project definitions
#
project(MKS_MicrovisionIP_RGA)

#
# optional compiler flags
#
set(CXXFLAGS_USER -g)


#
# Get global information
#
include(${MAKE_ENV}/cmake_tango.opt)

#
# Tango Class list used by project
#

#
# Files for Socket TANGO class
#
set(SOCKET  Socket)
set(SOCKET_PATH  ../../../protocols/Socket/src)
set(SOCKET_INCLUDE  ../../../protocols/Socket/src)
set(SOCKET_SRC  ${SOCKET_PATH}/${SOCKET}.cpp ${SOCKET_PATH}/${SOCKET}Class.cpp ${SOCKET_PATH}/${SOCKET}StateMachine.cpp ${SOCKET_PATH}/ClientSocket.cpp ${SOCKET_PATH}/SocketAccess.cpp)
#
# Files for MKS_MicrovisionIP_RGA TANGO class
#
set(MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA  MKS_MicrovisionIP_RGA)
set(MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA_PATH  ./)
set(MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA_INCLUDE  ./)
set(MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA_SRC  ${MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA_PATH}/${MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA}.cpp ${MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA_PATH}/${MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA}Class.cpp ${MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA_PATH}/${MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA}StateMachine.cpp ${MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA_PATH}/${MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA}DynAttrUtils.cpp ${MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA_PATH}/RGAThread.cpp)

#
# User additional include, link folders/libraries and source files
#
set(USER_INCL_DIR )
set(USER_LIB_DIR )
set(USER_LIBS )
set(USER_SRC_FILES )

#
# Set global info and include directories
#
set(ALL_CLASS_INCLUDE ${SOCKET_INCLUDE} ${MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA_INCLUDE} )
set(SERVER_SRC ${SOCKET_SRC} ${MKS_MICROVISIONIP_RGA_SRC}  ${USER_SRC_FILES} MultiClassesFactory.cpp main.cpp)
include_directories(${ALL_CLASS_INCLUDE}  ${USER_INCL_DIR} ${TANGO_INCLUDES})

#
# Device Server generation
#
set(SERVER_NAME MKS_MicrovisionIP_RGA)
include(${MAKE_ENV}/cmake_common_target.opt)
